name: Business-things
author: Gary Kovar

sections.description: Assuming you have set the hours of your business with google places you can include them as a widget within your site. So, if you change your hours, change them with google and they will change on the widget as well.
sections.installation:
1. Pull latest copy from the repository
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Setup your Google Places Web API credentials.
  4. Place the widget where you want it

short_description: This adds a widget to your site that displays the hours of the business and whether it is currently open.
description: Assuming you have set the hours of your business with google places you can include them as a widget within your site. So, if you change your hours, change them with google and they will change on the widget as well.
